alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:01PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ALLEGHANY COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN NORTH CAROLINA... CENTRAL CARROLL AND SOUTHEASTERN GRAYSON COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN VIRGINIA AND THE CITY OF GALAX THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 201 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galax, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Galax... Hillsville... Fries... Fancy Gap... Baywood... Lambsburg... and Gladesboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
